column5: This townhome is the perfect location for your fun-filled Padre Island getaway. Our property offers first class living on the Texas Gulf Coast. Every unit is custom decorated with modern, cottage style decor, an open layout & private patio allowing you to enjoy all the conveniences of home while relaxing at the beach. Our great location has quick access to swimming, fishing, surfing, Schlitterbahn Water Park & a variety of dining options. Minutes from the beach.
